price: 105.Nabiyow ku-marak koo dirabboyse mari Qhiyaamah ayro qaleela takku waytam, koo essera yi-Rabbi buluulusiyyah tet buluulusaah caacayat tet ruubaah foyya tet aba keenik ixxic.
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfan
